about_the_game:
Overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the Narwhal back! Point-and-click your way around town, run errands, and uncover the mystery. But choose who you help carefully - your decisions may come back to bite you! Think outside the box and brace yourself for a fever-dream adventure!



Find the Orange Narwhal is an interactive fiction remake of a game originally made in PowerPoint (yes that's right... in 4606 slides). Frankly the plot makes absolutely no sense and was just an excuse to do a multiverse mash-up of game themes and mechanics. We've got everything from:

  • Pirates
  • Ninjas
  • Police
  • Clowns
  • Mermaids
  • Zombies
  • ...and more NPCs!

Inspired by the Flash games of the early 2000s: embrace the chaos and get the satisfaction of finishing a challenge you didn't know you needed to begin with!

Overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the Narwhal back! Point-and-click your way around town, run errands, and uncover the mystery. But choose who you help carefully - your decisions may come back to bite you! Think outside the box and brace yourself for a fever-dream adventure!



Find the Orange Narwhal is an interactive fiction remake of a game originally made in PowerPoint (yes that's right... in 4606 slides). Frankly the plot makes absolutely no sense and was just an excuse to do a multiverse mash-up of game themes and mechanics. We've got everything from:

  • Pirates
  • Ninjas
  • Police
  • Clowns
  • Mermaids
  • Zombies
  • ...and more NPCs!

Inspired by the Flash games of the early 2000s: embrace the chaos and get the satisfaction of finishing a challenge you didn't know you needed to begin with!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4090
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 15
  • Processor: Apple M4
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:

name: Find the Orange Narwhal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4090
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
